title: Attempts to reduce social security benefits

content.question: Which of the following explains why any attempt to reduce Social Security benefits is difficult?

choices.label: The Supreme Court has ruled that benefits are constitutionally required.
Interest groups concerned with Social Security are ineffective.
The global economy makes government insurance programs necessary.
There are many voters who support Social Security.
Government cannot predict the number of new retirees each year.

content.answer: There are many voters who support Social Security.
